lead_paragraph: The bigger the mandibles, the more likely a male is to defeat a challenger for the attention of a female on a rotting log.

headline.print_headline: Jaws: The Story of the Stag Beetle
headline.main: Jaws: The Tale of the Fearsome Stag Beetle

snippet: The bigger the mandibles, the more likely a male is to defeat a challenger for the attention of a female on a rotting log....
abstract: Outsize jaws provide advantage to male stag beetles, with insect having longer jaws often winning territorial fights; researchers find larger jaws correspond to better muscle development and strength.
